address: 3 Oceanaires Avenue Coronet Bay VIC 3984
description:
Spacious Coastal Home
This coastal home on 575 m2 with its Hamptons flair offers an all white interior with 9' ceilings with deep fancy cornices & high detailed skirting boards, 4 panel solid timber doors & easy care flooring. A brand new gas log heater & mantle piece make a focal point between the lounge & dining area.
White timber blinds teamed with white beach curtains & timber floors in the main living area add to the coastal feel. Ceiling fans throughout team with a split system air conditioner & wall heaters in the bedrooms to keep you comfortable all year round. Situated on a rise in a very quiet pocket of the 'Bay', this home is deceiving & offers approximate 19 squares of living area plus decks to both the front and rear of the home. The rooms are larger than average with the master a huge 4 x 6m with a wall of sliding door robes and a door to the alfresco deck area at the rear of the home. There is potential to create an ensuite off the master with plumbing in place. The 2nd & 3rd bedrooms have ceiling fans & space for queen sized furniture. The kitchen has painted oak cupboards, dishwasher & new oven, built in microwave & glass cook top. There is a walk in pantry to add to the storage in this area. Outside is a new heat pump hot water service. A spacious dining area leads to the large undercover alfresco area & out onto further open air decking & to a low maintenance garden with sizeable garden shed. The block is private & has plenty of room for off-street parking. A short walk takes you to the beautiful swimming beach and coastal walkway between Coronet Bay and Corinella.
